identity.name: Lumina Senegal
identity.target_audience: Affluent Senegalese consumers seeking quality and reliability

rules: Never use pure black text on white; use #1D1D1F (Apple Grey)
Captions must be uppercase and wide (tracking-widest)
Use font-weight 500 (Medium) for body text in dark mode for legibility

glassmorphism.nav: bg-white/70 dark:bg-black/70 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-black/5 dark:border-white/10

buttons.primary: bg-black text-white dark:bg-white dark:text-black rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-sm font-medium hover:scale-105 transition-transform
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-black/10 dark:border-white/10 text-black dark:text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 text-sm font-medium hover:bg-black/5 dark:hover:bg-white/10
buttons.ghost: text-accent hover:text-accent/80 font-medium flex items-center gap-2 group

cards.product: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl bg-white dark:bg-[#1C1C1E] aspect-[4/5] transition-all duration-500 hover:shadow-2xl
cards.feature: bg-[#F5F5F7] dark:bg-[#111111] rounded-3xl p-12 flex flex-col justify-between h-full

inputs.default: h-12 bg-transparent border-b border-black/20 dark:border-white/20 focus:border-black dark:focus:border-white outline-none transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

landing_page.hero: Full-screen cinematic video/image. Text overlay: Bottom-Left or Center. 'Le shopping, autrement.'
landing_page.bento_grid: Use 'Tetris' grid for categories. Mix 2x2 squares with 1x2 tall rectangles.
landing_page.marquee: Slow scrolling list of premium brands (Apple, Samsung, Dyson, etc.) in monochrome.

product_page.layout: Two-column sticky. Left: Vertical scroll of huge images. Right: Sticky details panel.
product_page.gallery: Images must be full-width within their container. No thumbnails. Scroll to see more.
product_page.buy_section: Floating bottom bar on mobile. Sticky right sidebar on desktop.

cart_checkout.style: Single page. Left: Form (Minimal). Right: Order Summary (Grey background).
cart_checkout.trust_signals: Display Wave & Orange Money logos clearly near the 'Pay' button.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run 'npm install lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge' immediately.
2. CLEANUP: Delete App.css and index.css default styles. Replace with the Design System values.
3. COMPONENTS: Do not use default Shadcn styles. Override them with the 'visual_enhancers' rules (rounded-3xl, etc.).
4. IMAGES: Use the provided URLs. Do not use placeholders.
5. DARK MODE: Implement 'class' based dark mode. Default to Light Mode for that 'Apple Store' feel, but allow toggle.
6. SCROLL: Use 'lenis' for smooth scrolling if possible, or at least 'scroll-behavior: smooth'.
7. LANGUAGE: All text must be in French (as per 'Le shopping, autrement').
8. CURRENCY: Display all prices in 'FCFA' (e.g., '850.000 FCFA').
universal_guidelines: Never center text blocks longer than 3 lines.
Use 2x more whitespace than you think is necessary.
Images are the heroes. UI is the frame.
Interactive elements must have a 'hover' state that lifts or glows.
